lead_paragraph: Eddie Johnson, Major League Soccer’s leading scorer, has turned down a transfer from the Kansas City Wizards to Derby of England’s Premier League. Peter Vermes, the Wizards’ technical director, said he could not confirm the terms of the transfer fee offered by Derby, said to be around $3.6 million.
